'use client'; import React, { useLayoutEffect } from 'react'; import { gsap } from 'gsap'; import data from '../../../l-data/portfolios/worksfull.json'; function Header() { useLayoutEffect(() => { const tl = gsap.timeline(); tl.fromTo('.header', { y: 200 }, { y: 0 }, '+=2.5'); tl.fromTo( '.header .container', { opacity: 0, translateY: 40 }, { opacity: 1, translateY: 0 }, '-=0' ); // Cleanup function return () => tl.kill(); }, []); return (
{data.map((item, i) => (
))}

{item.title}

{item.subTitle}
))}
Next Slide
Prev Slide
); } export default Header;
